$sql

Initial value:

 'SELECT gltrans.type,
                systypes.typename,
                gltrans.typeno,
                periodno,
                SUM(amount) AS nettot
        FROM gltrans,
                systypes
        WHERE gltrans.type = systypes.typeid
        GROUP BY gltrans.type,
                systypes.typename,
                typeno,
                periodno
        HAVING ABS(SUM(amount))>0.01'
